mastheadInfo.title: Create, Innovate, Repeat.
mastheadInfo.description: I design and build digital solutions — web applications, systems, and AI integrations — with a focus on clarity, usability, and real-world constraints.

about.title: About
description: I'm Andrés, a software engineer with over 5 years of experience building digital products used in real-world environments.
I've worked across education, gaming, Web3, and internal platforms, contributing across the product lifecycle — from solution design to implementation and iteration.
I'm especially interested in the intersection of interfaces, systems, and artificial intelligence, and how technology can reduce complexity and improve user experience.

aboutStudio.title: About Abstudio
description: Abstudio is a growth-focused software agency with over 5 years of experience helping entrepreneurs and businesses succeed.
We combine creativity, data, and technology to deliver results through custom digital strategies, purposeful websites, and automated systems.

services.title: Digital Product Development
services.description: Design and development of web and mobile applications with a focus on clarity, maintainability, and steady iteration.

services.title: Interfaces & User Experience
services.description: Building accessible, performant, user-centered interfaces by combining product thinking with solid engineering.

services.title: Automation & Artificial Intelligence
services.description: Integrating AI and automation into workflows to reduce friction, save time, and unlock new capabilities.

services.title: Web & Mobile Development
services.description: We build websites and applications that connect with real users and support sustainable business growth.

services.title: Tailored Digital Strategies
services.description: We define and implement digital strategies focused on visibility, acquisition, and conversion.

services.title: Automation & Artificial Intelligence
services.description: We optimize operations through automation and AI to save time, reduce costs, and scale efficiently.

contact.inlineTitle: Let’s collaborate on your next product
contact.description: Open to collaborating on digital products, systems, and AI-driven solutions.

projects.title: Partners
projects.description: A mobile application that connects early-stage entrepreneurs with strategic partners who complement their skills.
impact: Designed onboarding flows focused on clarity and adoption.
Implemented matching logic with scalability in mind.
Prepared the product for future iterations.

projects.title: Launch
projects.description: A platform designed to validate product ideas and collect early feedback through guided flows.
impact: Integrated AI for roadmap generation and basic analysis.
Designed interfaces optimized for rapid iteration.
Enabled experimentation and learning loops.

projects.title: Tracker
projects.description: A personal finance application for managing budgets and tracking expenses.
impact: Designed a simple and clear experience for financial tracking.
Implemented core flows for expense registration and review.
Built a base structure ready for future improvements.

projects.title: Mundo Interior
projects.description: Mundo Interior is a digital platform exploring emotional education through storytelling and guided experiences for children.
impact: Designed content structures oriented toward storytelling and emotional awareness.
Built a modular layout to support different types of educational content.
Prepared the codebase for future interactive features.

projects.title: Taskr
projects.description: Taskr is a web application for task and workflow management, built to explore how small teams organize, prioritize, and execute work.
impact: Designed clear flows for creating, assigning, and prioritizing tasks.
Structured the frontend to support feature growth without constant refactors.
Focused the UX on reducing cognitive friction in day-to-day usage.

projects.title: PayLink
projects.description: PayLink is a web application that allows freelancers and creators to generate crypto payment links and track payment status.
impact: Implemented a complete flow to create and share payment links.
Integrated ERC-20 token payments (ETH, USDT, USDC) on Ethereum.
Built wallet connection and transaction feedback with a focus on clarity.

projects.title: Manhattan
projects.description: Manhattan is a website project where I worked as a frontend developer, implementing JavaScript-based UI components within an existing codebase.
impact: Built and integrated reusable JavaScript components with attention to responsiveness and consistency.

projects.title: Partners
projects.description: Partners connects early-stage entrepreneurs with strategic partners who complement their skills.
impact: Implemented core user flows for onboarding and profile creation.
Integrated matching logic to suggest compatible partners.
Focused on a smooth and simple mobile experience.

projects.title: Tracker
projects.description: Tracker is a personal finance application focused on helping users record expenses and better understand their spending.
impact: Implemented core flows for adding and reviewing expenses.
Designed a clear UI for daily financial tracking.
Laid the groundwork for future analytics and reporting features.
